DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate Safety And Pharmacokinetics Of A Single Dose Of PF-00868554 ( Filibuvir ) In Japanese Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Investigation safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics single oral administration PF-00868554 ( filibuvir ) healthy adult Japanese volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age 20 55 year . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg . A positive result Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HbsAg ) antihepatitis C virus serology , HIV antigen/antibody . Male subject history subfertility/infertility condition opinion investigator may affect fertility . Pregnant nursing female ; female childbearing potential .
